description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the win32k elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-30082):

1. Download the appropriate update package that addresses CVE-2024-30082.
2. Install the update on your system by following the prompts.
3. Restart your system if required to ensure all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- Apply the KB5039211 or KB5039212 update based on your operating system version to resolve the use-after-free issue.
- For manual installation, you can download the respective update packages from the official Microsoft Update Catalog:
  - [KB5039211](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039211)
  - [KB5039212](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039212)
  - [KB5039213](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039213)
  - [KB5039225](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039225)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is up to date with the latest patches.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
